LanguageData.LvTab_LVUPButtonDesc: Use experience to level up those who can level up.
LanguageData.LvTab_Distribute: Distribute stat with left shift *10, with left Ctrl *100 with left Alt -1
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_STR_Tip_Desc: Strength increase melee damage, carry weight, affects hard work.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_DEX_Tip_Desc: Dexterity affects melee/range accuracy, Delicate work.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_CHA_Tip_Desc: Charm affects Works related to animals and social activities.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_CON_Tip_Desc: Constitution affects damage reduction, immunity gain speed, and some simple or art work.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_AGL_Tip_Desc: Agility affects movement speed, melee evasion rate, and aiming speed.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_EXP_Tip_Desc: When a pawn gains skill EXP, it also gains level EXP.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_INT_Tip_Desc: Intelligence affects tasks that require knowledge like medical care.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_Need_EXP_Tip_Desc: to level up you need this amount of EXP.
LanguageData.PawnColumnWorker_StatPoint_Tip_Desc: You can distribute points to stats.
LanguageData.FP_RSLUM_setting_FlatStartingStat: disable randomized stat. all pawns have 0 starting stat.
LanguageData.FP_RSLUM_setting_ColonistPercent: Colonists will get this percent of their skill experience. default = 80
LanguageData.FP_RSLUM_setting_AnimalEXPPerTick: Animals will get this amount of EXP every 10 seconds. default = 500
LanguageData.FP_RSLUM_setting_LevelScaling: level scaling % (Depends on colonists average level) :
